img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 34.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/13/Wukong_MiddleHollow_34.jpg)
Prepare to deal with a group of Stone Spiders, as another archer posted on a high rock will try to make things difficult, but you can sprint over to find a wooden ramp behind him.
img_below_text:
Up ahead, you'll find another green Wisp along the left wall before reaching the Bonevault Shrine. Wonderful name.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 36.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/69/Wukong_MiddleHollow_36.jpg)

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts the player character in *Black Myth: Wukong* exploring a dark, web-filled cavern. The character wields a flaming staff and is approaching a glowing green Wisp (highlighted with a red circle) on the left wall. This scene follows an encounter with Stone Spiders and precedes the Bonevault Shrine, suggesting the Wisp serves as a collectible or guidepost in the progression.
